resources.string: Toggle settings to hide root and debug/developer options for ANZ Mobile Pay.
Toggle settings to hide debug/developer options from ANZ Shield.
Toggle settings to hide root from the Westpac Mobile Banking application.

Depending on the issue, I might not always be the best person to contact. If you have a payment issue, most likely contact the application provider or your bank for support. If you are having root detection problem or the module is not working then its best to contact me via XDA or email.
 
 You can contact me using any of the methods below where you can send me feedback, bug reports, feature requests or to simply follow me on social media for updates.
 
 Remember to actually write an actual message when contacting me! You'd be surprised how many people emailed me with no message.

This will bypass all the various system integrity checks so your device appears as if it was unmodified to ANZ.
This will tell ANZ Mobile Pay that debug/developer options are disabled even when they are enabled. Handy for Developers.
This will tell ANZ Shield that debug/developer options are disabled even when they are enabled. Handy for Developers.
This will bypass root detection which allows you to enabled Tap\'n\'Pay on your mobile device.
